meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rand Wise Kerry Benn Jon Groubert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7542.

td.p: Rand Wise, a math teacher from Decatur, Georgia
Kerry Benn, a legal news editor from Springfield, New Jersey
Jon Groubert, a former attorney from Denver, Colorado (whose 3-day cash winnings total $76,191)

tr.td: OCCUPATIONS IN NEWS
BEHIND THE BIBLICAL NAME
OTHER BRITISH ISLES
THE 1910s
FROM THE FRENCH
WINNING THROUGH ALLITERATION

$1,000
JonWhat is Annapolis?
$8,001
the University of Virginia')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
